name: Rich & Foiled Eyeshadow Palette
about: What it is:u00a0A nine-pan palette inspired by the allure of precious metals that features a debut foil-effect eyeshadowu2014plus, luxe mattes, shimmers, and metallics..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Discover a wealth of possibilities in a flash with the Morphe Rich & Foiled Eyeshadow Palette. Inspired by precious metals, this excessive, expressive, nine-pan curation elevates eye looks with luxe mattes, shimmers, and metallicsu2014plus, a debut formula-flexing, foil-effect Molten Metal Eyeshadow...This Set Contains:.- 9 x Eyeshadows
ingredients: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Silica, Phenyl Trimethicone, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Polysorbate 80, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Tin Oxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Acrylates/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Water (Aqua, Eau), Isohexadecane, Sorbitan Oleate, Tocopherol +/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Create your look with the luxe mattes, shimmers, and metallics, then amp it up with ultra-reflective, formula-flexing Molten Metal Eyeshadow..-Apply dry for all-over, creamy effects..-Using the side of a packing brush, sweep Molten Metal Eyeshadow across lids for smooth, blendable, incredibly luminous payoff..-Apply wet for enhanced, liquid effects..-Spray your brush tip with Continuous Setting Mist (sold separately), before picking up Molten Metal Eyeshadow..-Glide along lash lines or creases for molten-like shine.

reviews.review_title: Perfect cute neutrals & shimmers unbeatable price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The prettiest everyday colours for a soft pinky smokey eye as well as some goes with everything party shimmer shades. This palette is unbeatable for the price and is a staple in my daily makeup routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product use it almost everyday. Colours blend good together

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually purchase higher-end palettes because I've been burned by drugstore brands too many times. This is no better than a drugstore or maybe dollar store palette. The foil is basically Christmas glitter and it gets everywhere.
